SELECT BBS.StatisticsIdx , BBS.HomeIdx , BBS.StatisticsDate , BBS.StatisticsRealDate , BBS.IncomeAmount , BBS.SpendingAmount , BBS.RemainingAmount ,
BBSD.StatisticsDetailIdx , BBSD.AmountType , BBSD.Amount ,
C.CategoryIdx , C.CategoryCode , C.CategoryName
FROM BankBookStatistics BBS
LEFT JOIN BankBookStatisticsDetail BBSD ON BBSD.StatisticsIdx = BBS.StatisticsIdx
LEFT JOIN Category C ON BBSD.CategoryIdx = C.CategoryIdx
WHERE BBS.HomeIdx = #{homeIdx} AND SUBSTR(BBS.StatisticsRealDate, 1, 4) = #{statisticsRealDate}
ORDER BY BBS.StatisticsRealDate ASC

SELECT StatisticsIdx , HomeIdx , StatisticsDate , StatisticsRealDate , IncomeAmount , SpendingAmount , RemainingAmount , CreateDate
FROM BankBookStatistics WHERE HomeIdx = #{homeIdx} AND StatisticsRealDate = #{statisticsRealDate}
